channel.title: Reflections on My Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Reflections on My Portfolio

item.title: Cumulative Reflections
item.description: My cumulative experience at Iowa State University has strongly prepared me for a career in software engineering. My class experience has provided me with the problem solving skills to impact engineering solutions. Classes such as Project Management and Software Architecture have shaped my abilities to design systems and develop them efficiently. While working on team projects I have utilized technical communication skills. Freedom of project choice in classes has allowed me to pursue the learning of new technologies.

item.title: My General Education Reflections
item.description:
My General Education electives have played a role in shaping my professional engineering skills. Some elective course I’ve taken:

World Religions
US History
Linear Algebra

I believe my electives have influenced my communication and analytical skills.
